faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to help you get started.

items.question: What is "captions-first" for YouTube?
items.answer: When you paste a YouTube link, we check for existing captions first—they're faster and often more accurate. If none exist, our AI transcribes the audio directly. Both methods deliver great results; captions-first is just quicker.

items.question: How much can I transcribe for free?
items.answer: The Basic plan includes 60 minutes of AI transcription and 5 YouTube imports per month, plus 1 GB of cloud storage. Local recording is always unlimited. Premium removes all limits—transcribe and import as much as you need.

items.question: Which languages are supported?
items.answer: Our AI supports 50+ languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Mandarin, Japanese, and more. The app auto-detects the language, or you can set it manually for best results.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. All recordings and transcripts are encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256). Only you can access your data—we never sell, share, or use it to train AI. Delete your account anytime and everything goes with it.

items.question: How do I upgrade or cancel?
items.answer: Subscribe via the App Store—monthly ($9.99) or yearly ($79.99, save 33%). Cancel anytime in Settings → Apple ID → Subscriptions. You keep Premium access until your billing period ends. No hassle.
